metadata.title: CVE-2021-23423 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description: This affects the package bikeshed before 3.0.0. This can occur when anuntrusted source file containing include, include-code or include-raw blockis processed. The contents of arbitrary files could be disclosed in theHTML output.

criterions.comment: bikeshed package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
